text: I'm still messing with lighting at the moment however I'm unsure about how much I do now and what I do in post production in after effects - the frame rendered there is supposed to be a rainy/thundery/gloomy day so I don't know if I should change the colour of the lights to something more grey (although my lecturer has put in blues and oranges already). I'm using Arnold to Render, I've been making all this in Maya.
My plan for lighting is I want it to be moody and miserable but start to brighten up when he is united with his sister and even more so when his mother (Rosa) arrives to take him home.
